column1: Little Goat Diner////Looking at the menu ahead of time
column2: I'll admit I was a bit apprehensive at some of the flavor combinations.  But
column3: everything came together quite well!  I enjoyed pretty much every dish (the kale and chickpea salad wasn't quite my thing)
column4: and they were all served beautifully.  My favorite though
column5: was the chocolate pavlova dessert-I'm not a huge chocolate fan
column6: but it was the right balance of chocolate and other flavors.
